plot: A shady undercover cop and a corrupt internal affairs officer become the unlikely partners to capture gang leader, Rafael "El Chino" Rodriguez, alive in 12 hours.
title: Crimson Streets
plot_es: A shady undercover cop and a corrupt internal affairs officer become the unlikely partners to capture gang leader, Rafael "El Chino" Rodriguez, alive in 12 hours.
plot_en: A shady undercover cop and a corrupt internal affairs officer become the unlikely partners to capture gang leader, Rafael "El Chino" Rodriguez, alive in 12 hours.
